summary.span: 提供資訊，讓協助工具應用程式能用於為殘障使用者調整應用程式的使用者介面 (UI)。

span.span: Provides information that accessibility applications use to adjust an application's user interface (UI) for users with impairments.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 協助工具應用程式可以調整以提高可用性行動不便的使用者應用程式的功能。Accessibility applications can adjust features of the application to improve usability for users with disabilities. 針對有視力障礙的使用者，您可以調整以符合其需求的軟體和作業系統功能。For users who are visually impaired, you can adjust software and operating system features to comply with their needs. 比方說，您可以放大文字和影像，並以對比呈現它們。For example, you can enlarge text and images and render them with a contrast. 此外，您可以方便色盲使用適當的色彩。In addition, you can accommodate color-blindness with the appropriate use of colors. 對於使用者而言是嚴重視障，電腦都可使用螢幕上轉譯的畫面檢閱輔助存取語音或以動態的可重新整理，Braille 顯示器的文字。For users who are severely visually impaired, computers are accessible with screen review aids that translate on-screen text to speech or to a dynamic, refreshable, Braille display. 如果使用者是聽障人士中,，您可以設計使用視覺提示，例如閃爍的工具列; 的程式或者，您可以將語音的訊息顯示成文字。For users who are hard of hearing, you can design programs that use visual cues, such as a flashing toolbar; or you can display spoken messages as text. 例如，當開啟時，`SoundSentry`在控制台中的協助工具選項的功能，提供視覺警告時，系統會進行警示音效。For example, when turned on, the `SoundSentry` feature, an accessibility option in Control Panel, provides a visual warning whenever the system makes an alarm sound. 對於不便的使用者，您可以設計控制項可改善或不需要鍵盤和滑鼠使用，藉此改善電腦協助工具。For users with motion disabilities, you can design controls that refine or eliminate keyboard and mouse use, thereby improving computer accessibility. 控制台中可提供協助。Control Panel offers assistance. 比方說，有一個替代方法是使用數字鍵台而不是滑鼠，以瀏覽。For example, one alternative is to use the numeric keypad instead of the mouse for navigation. 另一個選項，稱為`StickyKeys`，可以讓使用者無法按住兩個或多個索引鍵 （例如 CTRL + P) 的一次一次輸入一個索引鍵來取得相同的結果。Another option, called `StickyKeys`, enables users who cannot hold down two or more keys at a time (such as CTRL+P) to get the same result by typing one key at a time. 使用認知的使用者和語言障礙，您可以設計更能兼容其需求的軟體程式。For users with cognitive and language disabilities, you can design software programs to better accommodate their needs. 例如，使用手機藏起來或被控制項的排序、 簡單的顯示、 較少的字詞和以小學標準為目標的閱讀程度，可以獲得這些使用者。For example, using conspicuous or cued sequencing, uncomplicated displays, fewer words, and a reading level targeted to elementary school standards can benefit these users. 使用者有拿取製劑，您可以設計軟體程式，以消除奪取的模式。For users with seizure disorders, you can design software programs to eliminate seizure provoking patterns. 如需有關協助工具，包括協助工具應用程式的相關資訊，請參閱 MSDN library 中或在 Microsoft 網站上的 Microsoft 協助工具的文件。For more information about accessibility, including information about accessibility applications, see the documentation for Microsoft Accessibility in the MSDN library or at the Microsoft Web site. > [!NOTE] > 若要使用，您必須加入的參考`Accessibility`以安裝組件[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]。To use the , you must add a reference to the `Accessibility` assembly installed with the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. Windows Form 僅支援 Active Accessibility 2.0。Windows Forms only supports Active Accessibility 2.0. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立協助工具感知的圖表控制項，使用和類別可公開存取的資訊。The following code example demonstrates the creation of an accessibility-aware chart control, using the and classes to expose accessible information. 控制項會繪製圖例以及兩個曲線。The control plots two curves along with a legend. `ChartControlAccessibleObject`類別，衍生自`ControlAccessibleObject`，會在方法，以提供針對 chart 控制項的自訂存取資訊。The `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class, which derives from `ControlAccessibleObject`, is used in the method to provide custom accessible information for the chart control. 因為不是實際圖表圖例-為基礎的控制，但改為繪製由圖表控制項，它並沒有任何內建的可存取資訊。Because the chart legend is not an actual -based control, but instead is drawn by the chart control, it does not have any built-in accessible information. 基於這個原因，`ChartControlAccessibleObject`類別會覆寫方法來傳回`CurveLegendAccessibleObject`，表示圖例的每個部分的存取資訊。Because of this, the `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class overrides the method to return the `CurveLegendAccessibleObject` that represents accessible information for each part of the legend. 當存取感知的應用程式會使用這個控制項時，控制項可以提供所需的存取資訊。When an accessible-aware application uses this control, the control can provide the necessary accessible information. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/CPP/chartcontrol.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/CS/chartcontrol.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/VB/chartcontrol.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般而言，當您使用這個方法來建立可存取物件時，您會提供您自己的實作的屬性和方法的類別，以提供您的應用程式特有的功能。Typically, when you use this method to create an accessible object, you are providing your own implementations of the properties and methods of the class to provide functionality specific to your application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回值類型屬性相依於具有鍵盤焦點的物件。The return value type of the property depends on the object that has keyboard focus. 下表描述的物件型別屬性會傳回。The following table describes the object types that the property returns. |類型Type|描述Description| |----------|-----------------| |`null`|此物件沒有鍵盤焦點本身並不包含具有鍵盤焦點的子系。This object does not have the keyboard focus itself and does not contain a child that has the keyboard focus.| |整數integer|如果目前的物件有鍵盤焦點，則 0否則，具有鍵盤焦點的子可存取物件的子系 ID。0 if the current object has keyboard focus; otherwise, the child ID of the child accessible object with keyboard focus.| ||可存取子物件具有鍵盤焦點。The child accessible object that has the keyboard focus.| 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下列程式碼說明這值，指定當呼叫`Select`執行複雜的選取作業。The following describes which values to specify when calling `Select` to perform complex selection operations. |運算Operation|旗標的組合Flag Combination| |---------------|----------------------| |若要模擬按一下To simulate a click| OR OR | |若要藉由模擬 CTRL + 按一下選取的目標項目To select a target item by simulating CTRL+click| OR OR | |若要取消選取目標項目，藉由模擬 CTRL + 按一下To cancel selection of a target item by simulating CTRL+click| OR OR | |模擬 SHIFT + 按一下To simulate SHIFT+click| OR OR | |選取某個範圍的物件，並將焦點放在最後一個物件To select a range of objects and put focus on the last object|指定上設定的選取項目錨點開始的物件。Specify on the starting object to set the selection anchor. 然後呼叫一次選取並指定或上的最後一個物件。Then call Select again and specify OR on the last object.| |若要取消選取所有物件To deselect all objects|指定任何物件。Specify on any object. 這個旗標會取消選取所有選取的物件，只選取除外。This flag deselects all selected objects except the one just selected. 然後呼叫一次選取並指定相同的物件。Then call Select again and specify on the same object.| 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.

summary.span: 取得可存取物件的位置和大小。

span.span: Gets the location and size of the accessible object.
A that represents the bounds of the accessible object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會擷取螢幕座標中的物件之周框。The property retrieves the object's bounding rectangle in screen coordinates. 如果物件具有非矩形的圖案，這個屬性代表最小完全涵蓋了整個物件區域的矩形。If the object has a nonrectangular shape, then this property represents the smallest rectangle that completely encompasses the entire object region. 因此，非矩形物件，例如清單檢視項目，物件的週框矩形的座標可以如果失敗測試，藉由呼叫方法，因為決定物件的界限，以像素 x 像素為基礎。Therefore, for nonrectangular objects such as list view items, the coordinates of the object's bounding rectangle can fail, if tested, by calling the method, because determines the object's boundaries on a pixel-by-pixel basis. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立協助工具感知的圖表控制項，使用和類別可公開存取的資訊。The following example demonstrates the creation of an accessibility-aware chart control, using the and classes to expose accessible information. 控制項會繪製圖例以及兩個曲線。The control plots two curves along with a legend. `ChartControlAccessibleObject`類別，衍生自`ControlAccessibleObject`，會在方法，以提供針對 chart 控制項的自訂存取資訊。The `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class, which derives from `ControlAccessibleObject`, is used in the method to provide custom accessible information for the chart control. 因為圖表圖例不會實際-為基礎的控制，但改為繪製由圖表控制項，它並沒有任何內建的可存取資訊。Since the chart legend is not an actual -based control, but instead is drawn by the chart control, it does not have any built-in accessible information. 基於這個原因，`ChartControlAccessibleObject`類別會覆寫方法來傳回`CurveLegendAccessibleObject`，表示圖例的每個部分的存取資訊。Because of this, the `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class overrides the method to return the `CurveLegendAccessibleObject` that represents accessible information for each part of the legend. 當存取感知的應用程式會使用這個控制項時，控制項可以提供所需的存取資訊。When an accessible-aware application uses this control, the control can provide the necessary accessible information. 此程式碼摘錄會示範如何覆寫屬性。This code excerpt demonstrates overriding the property. 請參閱類別的完整程式碼範例的概觀。See the class overview for the complete code example. summary.span: 取得描述物件之預設動作的字串。

span.span: Gets a string that describes the default action of the object.

summary.span: 並非所有的物件都有預設動作。

span.span: Not all objects have a default action.

value.span: 物件預設動作的描述；若此物件沒有預設動作，則為 。

span.span: A description of the default action for an object, or if this object has no default action.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字串會描述不物件用途結果的物件執行的動作。The string describes the action that is performed on an object, not what the object does as a result. 也就是列印文件的工具列按鈕有預設動作"Press"，而不是"會列印目前文件。 」That is, a toolbar button that prints a document has a default action of "Press" rather than "Prints the current document." 請勿混淆物件的預設動作，並將其值。Do not confuse an object's default action with its value.

exception.span: 無法擷取控制項的預設動作。

span.span: The default action for the control cannot be retrieved.

para.span: 如果物件會包裝; 的預設動作的系統控制項，預設實作會傳回可存取物件的預設動作否則，它會傳回。

span.span: The default implementation returns the accessible object's default action if the object wraps a system control that has a default action; otherwise, it returns .

para.span: 執行動作的控制項應該支援此方法。

span.span: Only controls that perform actions should support this method.

para.span: 並非所有的物件有預設動作，且有些物件可能會有相關的預設動作其屬性，如下列範例所示：選取的核取方塊具有 「 取消核取 」 的預設動作和值的 「 檢查 」。

span.span: Not all objects have default actions, and some objects might have a default action that is related to its property, such as in the following examples: A selected check box has a default action of "Uncheck" and a value of "Checked."

para.span: 已清除的核取方塊具有 「 檢查 」 的預設動作，值是 「 未核取 」。

span.span: A cleared check box has a default action of "Check" and a value of "Unchecked."

para.span: 標記為 「 列印 」 的按鈕有預設動作是 「 按下 「 沒有值。

span.span: A button labeled "Print" has a default action of "Press," with no value.

para.span: 靜態文字控制項或編輯控制項，顯示"Printer"沒有預設動作，不過會有值為"Printer"。

span.span: A static text control or an edit control that shows "Printer" has no default action, but would have a value of "Printer."

para.span: 物件的屬性應該是動詞或動詞簡短片語。

span.span: An object's property should be a verb or a short verb phrase.

span.span: The default implementation returns the accessible object's description if the object wraps a system control; otherwise, it returns .

para.span: 描述通常用以針對視障或眼盲的使用者提供更高的內容。

span.span: The description is typically used to provide greater context for low-vision or blind users.

para.span: 它也可以使用搜尋內容或其他應用程式。

span.span: It can also be used for context searching or other applications.

para.span: 伺服器必須支援屬性描述項目並不明顯的則它是多餘，根據物件的， ， ，和屬性。

span.span: Servers need to support the property if the description is not obvious, or if it is redundant based on the object's , , , and properties.

para.span: 比方說，具有 [確定] 的按鈕不需要額外的資訊，但是顯示圖片的仙人掌的按鈕。

span.span: For example, a button with "OK" does not need additional information, but a button that shows a picture of a cactus would.

para.span: ， ，也可能仙人掌按鈕的屬性會描述其用途，但屬性傳達是無形的例如 「 顯示圖片的仙人掌按鈕 」 的資訊。

span.span: The , , and perhaps properties for the cactus button describe its purpose, but the property conveys information that is less tangible, like "A button that shows a picture of a cactus".

summary.span: 執行與這個可存取物件相關的預設動作。

span.span: Performs the default action associated with this accessible object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用戶端可以藉由檢查物件的擷取物件的預設動作屬性。Clients can retrieve the object's default action by inspecting an object's property. 用戶端可以使用自動化 （如果支援） 而不是執行物件的預設動作。A client can use automation (if supported) instead of to perform an object's default action. 不過，可讓您輕鬆地執行物件的最常用的動作。However, provides an easy way to perform an object's most commonly used action.

exception.span: 無法執行控制項的預設動作。

span.span: The default action for the control cannot be performed.

para.span: 由系統提供的使用者介面項目執行的預設動作，取決於鍵盤狀態。

span.span: The default action performed by system-provided user interface elements depends on the keyboard state.

para.span: 也就是說，例如 SHIFT 輔助按鍵，ALT 或 ctrl 鍵是否按下 （無論是由使用者動作或以程式設計方式） 時呼叫時，預設值的動作可能不是當這些索引鍵不是向下相同。

span.span: That is, if a modifier key such as SHIFT, ALT, or CTRL is down (either by a user action or programmatically) when is called, the default action might not be the same as when those keys are not down.

para.span: 並非所有的物件都有預設動作。

span.span: Not all objects have a default action.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 現用視窗的相關概念的鍵盤焦點。The concept of keyboard focus is related to that of an active window. 現用視窗是使用者正在使用的前景視窗。An active window is the foreground window in which the user is working. 使用中視窗或作用中視窗的子物件具有鍵盤焦點的物件。The object with the keyboard focus is either the active window or a child object of the active window. 只有一個物件或容器內的項目可以有焦點，一次。Only one object or item within a container can have the focus at any one time. 具有鍵盤焦點的物件不一定是所選的物件。The object with the keyboard focus is not necessarily the selected object.

summary.span: 取得可存取物件的快速鍵或便捷鍵 (Access Key)。

span.span: Gets the shortcut key or access key for the accessible object.

value.span: 可存取物件的快速鍵或便捷鍵；物件如果沒有相關的快速鍵，則為 。

span.span: The shortcut key or access key for the accessible object, or if there is no shortcut key associated with the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 存取金鑰，也就是助憶鍵，是功能表、 功能表項目、 按鈕或一些其他控制項的標籤文字中加底線的字元。An access key, also known as a mnemonic, is an underlined character in the text of a menu, menu item, label of a button, or some other control. 比方說，使用者可以按 ALT 鍵，同時也按指定之底線的按鍵，例如 ALT + F，若要開啟 顯示功能表`File`功能表。For example, a user can display a menu by pressing the ALT key while also pressing the indicated underlined key, such as ALT+F, to open the `File` menu. 若要使用便捷鍵的功能表項目，包含項目的功能表必須是作用中。To use the access key of a menu item, the menu containing the item must be active. 控制項，例如工具列按鈕和功能表項目通常會有相關聯的快速鍵。Controls such as toolbar buttons and menu items often have an associated shortcut key. 功能表項目可以有與其相關聯的快速鍵和便捷鍵。A menu item can have both an access key and a shortcut key associated with it. 如果值屬性是單一字元，您可以假設它是一種存取金鑰。If the value of the property is a single character, you can assume it is an access key.

exception.span: 無法擷取控制項的捷徑。

span.span: The shortcut for the control cannot be retrieved.

para.span: 有快速鍵或便捷鍵的所有物件應該都支援此屬性。

span.span: All objects that have a shortcut key or access key should support this property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性是用戶端用來識別、 搜尋或宣告的使用者物件的字串。The property is a string used by clients to identify, find, or announce an object for the user. 若要存取子物件的名稱，您必須先呼叫具有您要擷取其名稱之子系的索引。To access the name of a child object, you must first call with the index of the child whose name you are retrieving. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立協助工具感知的圖表控制項，使用和類別可公開存取的資訊。The following example demonstrates the creation of an accessibility-aware chart control, using the and classes to expose accessible information. 控制項會繪製圖例以及兩個曲線。The control plots two curves along with a legend. `ChartControlAccessibleObject`類別，衍生自`ControlAccessibleObject`，會在方法，以提供針對 chart 控制項的自訂存取資訊。The `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class, which derives from `ControlAccessibleObject`, is used in the method to provide custom accessible information for the chart control. 因為圖表圖例不會實際-為基礎的控制，但改為繪製由圖表控制項，它並沒有任何內建的可存取資訊。Since the chart legend is not an actual -based control, but instead is drawn by the chart control, it does not have any built-in accessible information. 基於這個原因，`ChartControlAccessibleObject`類別會覆寫方法來傳回`CurveLegendAccessibleObject`，表示圖例的每個部分的存取資訊。Because of this, the `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class overrides the method to return the `CurveLegendAccessibleObject` that represents accessible information for each part of the legend. 當存取感知的應用程式會使用這個控制項時，控制項可以提供所需的存取資訊。When an accessible-aware application uses this control, the control can provide the necessary accessible information. 此程式碼摘錄會示範如何覆寫屬性。This code excerpt demonstrates overriding the property. 請參閱類別的完整程式碼範例的概觀。See the class overview for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/CPP/chartcontrol.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/CS/chartcontrol.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/VB/chartcontrol.vb#6)]

para.span: 所有的物件應該支援此屬性。

span.span: All objects should support this property.

para.span: 物件的名稱應該直覺，讓使用者了解物件的意義或用途。

span.span: An object's name should be intuitive so that users understand the object's meaning or purpose.

para.span: 此外，請確認是唯一相對於父項中任何同層級物件的屬性。

span.span: Also, ensure that the property is unique relative to any sibling objects in the parent.

para.span: 資料表內的瀏覽顯示部分使用者特別困難的問題。

span.span: Navigation within tables presents especially difficult problems for some users.

para.span: 因此，伺服器開發人員應該讓資料表資料格名稱盡量具有描述性。

span.span: Therefore, server developers should make table cell names as descriptive as possible.

para.span: 比方說，您可以建立資料格名稱，藉由結合名稱的資料列和資料行，它會佔用，例如"A1"。

span.span: For example, you might create a cell name by combining the names of the row and column it occupies, such as "A1."

para.span: 不過，它通常最好是使用更具描述性的名稱，例如"Karin，年 2 月 」。

span.span: However, it is generally better to use more descriptive names, such as "Karin, February."

para.span: 許多物件，例如圖示、 功能表、 核取方塊、 下拉式方塊和其他控制項中，有會向使用者顯示的標籤。

span.span: Many objects, such as icons, menus, check boxes, combo boxes, and other controls, have labels that are displayed to users.

para.span: 向使用者顯示任何標籤應用於物件的屬性。

span.span: Any label displayed to users should be used for the object's property.

para.span: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱屬性。

span.span: For more information, see the Property.

para.span: 如果您使用功能表或按鈕文字屬性，去除連字號 (&)，將標記鍵盤存取金鑰。

span.span: If you are using menu or button text for the property, strip out the ampersands (&) that mark the keyboard access keys.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一律在容器內的使用者介面項目只有導覽、 空間和邏輯。Navigation, both spatial and logical, is always restricted to the user interface elements within a container. 使用空間巡覽時，用戶端只能巡覽使用在開始物件的同層級。With spatial navigation, clients can navigate only to a sibling of the starting object. 根據搭配邏輯巡覽的巡覽旗標，用戶端可以瀏覽到子系或同層級的開始物件。Depending on the navigational flag used with logical navigation, clients can navigate to either a child or to a sibling of the starting object. 這個方法不會變更選取範圍或焦點。This method does not change the selection or focus. 若要將焦點變更，或選取的物件，使用。To change the focus or to select an object, use . 方法會擷取僅使用者介面項目有定義的螢幕位置。The method retrieves only user interface elements that have a defined screen location. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立協助工具感知的圖表控制項，使用和類別可公開存取的資訊。The following example demonstrates the creation of an accessibility-aware chart control, using the and classes to expose accessible information. 控制項會繪製圖例以及兩個曲線。The control plots two curves along with a legend. `ChartControlAccessibleObject`類別，衍生自`ControlAccessibleObject`，會在方法，以提供針對 chart 控制項的自訂存取資訊。The `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class, which derives from `ControlAccessibleObject`, is used in the method to provide custom accessible information for the chart control. 因為圖表圖例不會實際-為基礎的控制，但改為繪製由圖表控制項，它並沒有任何內建的可存取資訊。Since the chart legend is not an actual -based control, but instead is drawn by the chart control, it does not have any built-in accessible information. 基於這個原因，`ChartControlAccessibleObject`類別會覆寫方法來傳回`CurveLegendAccessibleObject`，表示圖例的每個部分的存取資訊。Because of this, the `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class overrides the method to return the `CurveLegendAccessibleObject` that represents accessible information for each part of the legend. 當存取感知的應用程式會使用這個控制項時，控制項可以提供所需的存取資訊。When an accessible-aware application uses this control, the control can provide the necessary accessible information. 此程式碼示範顯示覆寫方法。This code demonstrates shows overriding the method. 請參閱類別的完整程式碼範例的概觀。See the class overview for the complete code example. remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件的角色，可協助說明物件的函數。The role of the object helps describe the function of the object. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立協助工具感知的圖表控制項，使用和類別可公開存取的資訊。The following example demonstrates the creation of an accessibility-aware chart control, using the and classes to expose accessible information. 控制項會繪製圖例以及兩個曲線。The control plots two curves along with a legend. `ChartControlAccessibleObject`類別，衍生自`ControlAccessibleObject`，會在方法，以提供針對 chart 控制項的自訂存取資訊。The `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class, which derives from `ControlAccessibleObject`, is used in the method to provide custom accessible information for the chart control. 因為圖表圖例不會實際-為基礎的控制，但改為繪製由圖表控制項，它並沒有任何內建的可存取資訊。Since the chart legend is not an actual -based control, but instead is drawn by the chart control, it does not have any built-in accessible information. 基於這個原因，`ChartControlAccessibleObject`類別會覆寫方法來傳回`CurveLegendAccessibleObject`，表示圖例的每個部分的存取資訊。Because of this, the `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class overrides the method to return the `CurveLegendAccessibleObject` that represents accessible information for each part of the legend. 當存取感知的應用程式會使用這個控制項時，控制項可以提供所需的存取資訊。When an accessible-aware application uses this control, the control can provide the necessary accessible information. 此程式碼摘錄會示範如何覆寫屬性。This code excerpt demonstrates overriding the property. 請參閱類別的完整程式碼範例的概觀。See the class overview for the complete code example. summary.span: 修改選取或者移動可存取物件的鍵盤焦點。

span.span: Modifies the selection or moves the keyboard focus of the accessible object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用程式可以使用這個方法來執行複雜的選取作業。Applications can use this method to perform complex selection operations. 下列程式碼說明這值，指定當呼叫執行複雜的選取作業。The following describes which values to specify when calling to perform complex selection operations. |運算Operation|旗標的組合Flag Combination| |---------------|----------------------| |若要模擬按一下To simulate a click| `OR` **注意：** 如果從自己的應用程式中呼叫，這種組合將不會選取所需的控制項。 `OR` **Note:** This combination will not select the desired control if called from within your own application. 會有想要的效果，不過，如果從外部應用程式呼叫。It will have the desired effect, however, if called from an external application.| |若要藉由模擬 CTRL + 按一下選取的目標項目To select a target item by simulating CTRL + click| `OR` `OR` | |若要取消選取目標項目，藉由模擬 CTRL + 按一下To cancel selection of a target item by simulating CTRL + click| `OR` `OR` | |模擬 SHIFT + 按一下To simulate SHIFT + click| `OR` `OR` | |選取某個範圍的物件，並將焦點放在最後一個物件To select a range of objects and put focus on the last object|指定上設定的選取項目錨點開始的物件。Specify on the starting object to set the selection anchor. 然後呼叫一次，並指定 `OR` 上的最後一個物件。Then call again and specify `OR` on the last object.| |若要取消選取所有物件To deselect all objects|指定任何物件。Specify on any object. 這個旗標會取消選取所有選取的物件，只選取除外。This flag deselects all selected objects except the one just selected. 然後呼叫一次，並指定相同的物件。Then call again and specify on the same object.| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立協助工具感知的圖表控制項，使用和類別可公開存取的資訊。The following example demonstrates the creation of an accessibility-aware chart control, using the and classes to expose accessible information. 控制項會繪製圖例以及兩個曲線。The control plots two curves along with a legend. `ChartControlAccessibleObject`類別，衍生自`ControlAccessibleObject`，會在方法，以提供針對 chart 控制項的自訂存取資訊。The `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class, which derives from `ControlAccessibleObject`, is used in the method to provide custom accessible information for the chart control. 因為圖表圖例不會實際-為基礎的控制，但改為繪製由圖表控制項，它並沒有任何內建的可存取資訊。Since the chart legend is not an actual -based control, but instead is drawn by the chart control, it does not have any built-in accessible information. 基於這個原因，`ChartControlAccessibleObject`類別會覆寫方法來傳回`CurveLegendAccessibleObject`，表示圖例的每個部分的存取資訊。Because of this, the `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class overrides the method to return the `CurveLegendAccessibleObject` that represents accessible information for each part of the legend. 當存取感知的應用程式會使用這個控制項時，控制項可以提供所需的存取資訊。When an accessible-aware application uses this control, the control can provide the necessary accessible information. 此程式碼示範顯示覆寫方法。This code demonstrates shows overriding the method. 請參閱類別的完整程式碼範例的概觀。See the class overview for the complete code example. remarks.format: ## Remarks `invokeAttr` 參數可能是建構函式、方法、屬性或欄位。The `invokeAttr` parameter may be a constructor, method, property, or field. 您必須指定適當的引動過程屬性。A suitable invocation attribute must be specified. 藉由將空字串 ("") 傳遞為成員名稱的方式，叫用類別的預設成員。Invoke the default member of a class by passing the empty string ("") as the name of the member. `modifiers`參數的長度相同`args`參數，表示叫用的成員的中繼資料中的引數屬性。The `modifiers` parameter has the same length as the `args` parameter, representing the invoked member's argument attributes in the metadata. 參數可以具有下列屬性： pdIn，pdOut，pdRetval，pdOptional，和 pdHasDefault。A parameter can have the following attributes: pdIn, pdOut, pdRetval, pdOptional, and pdHasDefault. 這些分別代表 [In]、[Out]、[retval]、[optional] 和預設參數。These represent [In], [Out], [retval], [optional], and a default parameter, respectively. 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含自訂的 UI 物件，類似於系統提供的物件時，伺服器應用程式可以呼叫此函式。Server applications can call this function when they contain a custom UI object that is similar to a system-provided object. 伺服器應用程式會呼叫`CreateStdAccessibleObject`，並覆寫方法和屬性，視需要以符合其自訂的物件。Server applications call `CreateStdAccessibleObject` and override the methods and properties as needed to match their custom object. 這種方法將完整實作所有的工作儲存 server 開發人員屬性和方法。This approach saves server developers the work of fully implementing all the properties and methods. 此函數很相似`CreateStdAccessibleProxy`，只不過`CreateStdAccessibleProxy`可讓您指定的類別名稱做為參數，而`CreateStdAccessibleObject`會使用相關聯的類別名稱`hwnd`。This function is similar to `CreateStdAccessibleProxy`, except that `CreateStdAccessibleProxy` enables you to specify the class name as a parameter, whereas `CreateStdAccessibleObject` uses the class name associated with the `hwnd`. 呼叫這一版的`UseStdAccessible`等同於呼叫的用戶端 objid 的兩個參數版本。Calling this version of the `UseStdAccessible` is the same as calling the two parameter version with an objid of CLIENT.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立可存取物件使用的方法和屬性的指定型別的系統提供的使用者介面項目。Creates an accessible object with the methods and properties for the specified type of system-provided user interface element. 包含自訂的 UI 物件，類似於系統提供的物件時，伺服器應用程式可以呼叫此函式。Server applications can call this function when they contain a custom UI object that is similar to a system-provided object. 伺服器應用程式會呼叫`CreateStdAccessibleObject`，並覆寫方法和屬性，視需要以符合其自訂的物件。Server applications call `CreateStdAccessibleObject` and override the methods and properties as needed to match their custom object. 這種方法將完整實作所有的工作儲存 server 開發人員屬性和方法。This approach saves server developers the work of fully implementing all the properties and methods. 有效`objid`值。Valid `objid` values. |ObjectObject|值Value|描述Description| |------------|-----------|-----------------| |警示ALERT|0xFFFFFFF60xFFFFFFF6|指的是與視窗或應用程式相關聯的訊息。Refers to a message associated with a window or application.| |插入號CARET|0xFFFFFFF80xFFFFFFF8|指的是文字插入列 （插入號） 視窗中。Refers to the text insertion bar (caret) in the window.| |用戶端CLIENT|0xFFFFFFFC0xFFFFFFFC|指的是視窗的工作區。Refers to the window's client area. 在大部分情況下，作業系統控制框架項目，並在用戶端物件包含應用程式可控制的所有項目。In most cases, the operating system controls the frame elements, and the client object contains all elements that the application controls.| |資料指標CURSOR|0xFFFFFFF70xFFFFFFF7|指的是滑鼠指標。Refers to the mouse pointer. 在系統中只有一個滑鼠指標，而且它不是視窗的子系。There is only one mouse pointer in the system and it is not a child of a window.| |HSCROLLHSCROLL|0xFFFFFFFA0xFFFFFFFA|指的是視窗的水平捲軸。Refers to the window's horizontal scroll bar.| |MENUMENU|0xFFFFFFFD0xFFFFFFFD|指的是視窗的功能表列。Refers to the window's menu bar.| |SIZEGRIPSIZEGRIP|0xFFFFFFF90xFFFFFFF9|指的是視窗的調整大小底框，位於視窗框架的右上角的選擇性框架元件。Refers to the window's size grip, an optional frame component located at the lower right corner of the window frame.| |音效SOUND|0xFFFFFFF50xFFFFFFF5|是指 sound 物件。Refers to a sound object. 音效物件沒有螢幕位置或子系，但沒有名稱和狀態屬性。Sound objects do not have screen locations or children, but do have name and state attributes. 也就是播放音效的應用程式的子系。They are children of the application playing the sound.| |SYSMENUSYSMENU|0xFFFFFFFF0xFFFFFFFF|指的是視窗的 [系統] 功能表。Refers to the window's system menu.| |標題列TITLEBAR|0xFFFFFFFE0xFFFFFFFE|指的是視窗的標題列。Refers to the window's title bar.| |VSCROLLVSCROLL|0xFFFFFFFB0xFFFFFFFB|指的是視窗的垂直捲軸。Refers to the window's vertical scroll bar.| |視窗WINDOW|0x000000000x00000000|指的是視窗本身而不是子物件。Refers to the window itself rather than to a child object.|

summary.span: 取得或設定可存取物件的數值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value of an accessible object.

value.span: 可存取物件的值，或者，如果未設定物件值，則為 。

span.span: The value of an accessible object, or if the object has no value set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般而言，屬性表示視覺物件所包含的資訊。Typically, the property represents visual information contained by the object. 並非所有的物件支援屬性。Not all objects support the property. 在大部分情況下，屬性用來告訴 visual 的物件資訊包含用戶端。In most cases, the property is used to tell the client about what visual information an object contains. 例如，編輯控制項的值是它所包含的文字，但功能表項目沒有任何值。For example, the value for an edit control is the text it contains, but a menu item has no value. 屬性可提供階層式的資訊，例如樹狀檢視控制項的情況下。The property can provide hierarchical information in cases such as a tree view control. 雖然樹狀檢視控制項中的父物件不提供資訊中的屬性，在控制項內的每個項目具有以零為起始的值，表示其在階層內的層級。Although the parent object in the tree view control does not provide information in the property, each item within the control has a zero-based value that represents its level within the hierarchy. 最上層的項目有值為零，第二個層級項目有值為 1，依此類推。Top-level items have a value of zero, second-level items have a value of one, and so on. > [!NOTE] > 傳回的值從捲軸和 trackbar 可存取物件表示的百分比，因此它們都是介於 0 到 100 (含) 之間的整數。The values returned from scroll bar and trackbar accessible objects indicate percentages, so they are integers between 0 and 100, inclusive.

exception.span: 無法設定或擷取數值。

span.span: The value cannot be set or retrieved.
